specialRules.title: Battlefortresses and Gunfortresses
description: Battlefortresses and Gunfortresses may only transport units from their own formation (i.e., the rules for War Engine transports do not apply to them when using the tournament army lists).

specialRules.title: Power Fields
description: Some Ork war engines are protected by banks of power fields. The number each war engine has is noted on its datasheet. Power fields work in exactly the same manner as Void Shields (see Void Shields), with the sole exception that they may not be repaired once they have been knocked down by a hit, and will instead remain down for the remainder of the battle. In the case of a variable amount of power fields, roll for them straight after the formation is deployed on the table or offboard.

specialRules.title: Super-Expendable
description: A formation does not receive a Blast Marker when a unit with super-expendable is destroyed, this includes the extra Blast Marker from the first casualty of a crossfire and for units destroyed for being out of formation after a move. If a super-expendable unit is hit by a weapon with Disrupt it does not inflict a Blast Marker.
Super-expendable units killed in an assault do not count when working out the result.
If a formation is comprised completely of expendable and/or super-expendable units then they do not benefit from any of the rules above.

specialRules.title: God Machine
description: War Engines with a starting Damage Capacity of 8 or more are subject to the God Machine special rule.

The magnificence of these awe-inspiring constructs comes at a price, for if such an incarnation of power were to falter or be destroyed, the forces that are there to aid them would become greatly disturbed.

For this reason, whenever a unit with God Machine special rule is broken, all friendly formations suffer 1 BM. Whenever a unit with God Machine special rule is destroyed, all friendly units suffer D3+1 BMs.
Units with the God Machine special rule are themselves immune to this effect.

specialRules.title: Split Fire
description: War Engines with a starting Damage Capacity of 8 or more may declare that they will Split Fire when attempting to perform a Sustain Fire action. If successful, the WE may fire at up to two enemy formations, but may not target more than one formation per individual weapon, and gets no +1 to-hit modifier from performing a Sustain Fire.

unit.name: Warlord
unit.notes: Has 'Ore Dakka if added to a WE unit, or Power Claw if added to an INF unit

unit.name: Big Mek
unit.notes: Has 'Ore Dakka if added to a WE unit, or Power Claw if added to an INF unit

unit.name: Oddboy
specialRules: Replace one Big Gun weapon with either a Supa-Zzap-Gun, Soopagun or Weirdboy Tower, alternatively the unit may be given D3+1 power fields

unit.name: Big Mob Oddboy
specialRules: *'Uge Banner of Mork (or possibly Gork)*: (Gargants Only) The unit gains the Inspiring special rule
unit.notes: Replace one Big Gun weapon with either a Supa-Zzap-Gun, Soopagun or Weirdboy Tower, alternatively the unit may be given D3+1 power fields or a 'Uge Banner of Mork (or possibly Gork)

unit.name: Speed Freek Oddboy
specialRules: The unit is given either D3+1 power fields, or replaces a Big Gun with a Lifta Droppa, or is equipped with a Deff-Rolla (Improve CC to 2+) and Red Paint Job (+5 cm movement).

unit.name: Battlewagon
specialRules: Transport: Two units of Boyz, Nobz, Kommandos or Grotz. Big Gunz takes two spaces each. May carry one unit of Grotz in addition to any other units transported

unit.name: Gunwagon
specialRules: Transport: One unit of Boyz, Nobz, Kommandos or Grotz

unit.name: Flakwagon
specialRules: Transport: One unit of Boyz, Nobz, Kommandos or Grotz

unit.name: Stompa
unit.notes: Armed with either three Big Gunz, or two Big Guns and a Kombat 'Ammer

unit.name: Battlefortress
specialRules: Transport: Eight Boyz, Nobz, Kommandos, Grotz. Big Gunz takes two spaces each. May carry four units of Grotz in addition to any other units transported
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: Move the Battlefortress D6 cm in a random direction, all units moved over or contacted it suffer a hit. The Battlefortress is destroyed, and all units being carried are destroyed unless they roll a 6+

unit.name: Gunfortress
specialRules: Transport: Four Boyz, Nobz, Kommandos, Grotz. Big Gunz takes two spaces each. May carry two units of Grotz in addition to any other units transported
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: Move the Gunfortress D6 cm in a random direction, all units moved over or contacted it suffer a hit. The Gunfortress is destroyed, and all units being carried are destroyed unless they roll a 6+

unit.name: Supa-Stompa
specialRules: Armed with either three Soopaguns, or two Soopaguns and a Killa-Choppa
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Supa Stompa catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Supa-Stompa
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Supa Stompa catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Gargant
specialRules: Armed with either three Soopaguns or two Soopaguns and either Supa-Zzap-Gun or a Killa-Choppa
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Gargant catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Gargant
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Gargant catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Great Gargant
specialRules: Armed with either two Twin Soopaguns or one Twin Soopagun and a Lifta-Droppa
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Great Gargant catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Great Gargant
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Great Gargant catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Mega Gargant
unit.notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Mega Gargant catches fire. Roll 1D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. 1: An additional fire starts. 5-6: The fire is put out. Each fire burning at the end of the End Phase cause 1 point of damage. These cause criticals and Blast Markers like normal damage.

unit.name: Bommer
unit.Notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Bommer is destroyed

unit.name: Landa
specialRules: Transport: Ten Killa Kans, Warbikes, Boyz, Nobz, Kommandos, Stormboyz, Grotz. Big Gunz, Warbuggies, Skorchas, Dreadnoughts takes two spaces each. May carry fout units of Grotz in addition to any other units transported
unit.Notes: ¤Critical Hit Effect¤: The Landa and all units being transported are destroyed

unit.name: Battlekroozer
specialRules: Slow to arrive (may only arrive from turn 2 onwards)
Transport: May transport 12 Landas and the units carried on them

unit.name: Orks Junkatruckz
specialRules: Transport (may carry one of the following units: Boyz, Nobz, Wildboyz. May carry one Grotz in addition to any other units).

unit.name: Ork Squiggoth
specialRules: Transport (may carry up to four of the following units: Boyz, Nobz, Wildboyz. May carry up to two Grotz in addition to any other units).

unit.name: Orkeosaurus
specialRules: Transport (may carry up to twelve of the following units: Boyz, Nobz, Wildboyz. May carry up to six Grotz in addition to any other units)
unit.notes: Critical Hit Effect: The unit takes a point of damage and moves 3D6cm in a random direction. If it moves into impassable terrain it stops and is destroyed. If it moves into another unit or units, it stops and one of those units suffers a macro-weapon hit

unit.name: Ork Steam Gargant
specialRules: May be armed with either 2 Soopaguns, or 1 Soopagun and 1 Mega-Choppa, or 2 Mega-Choppa.
unit.notes: Critical Hit Effect: The Steam Gargant’s boiler explodes. The Steam Gargant is destroyed and any units within 2D6cm of the model suffer a hit.
